General.Name: Scientex Packaging
General.Description: Scientex Packaging (Ayer Keroh) Berhad engages in manufacturing and marketing flexible packaging materials in Malaysia, Australia, Thailand, Myanmar, Singapore, the Philippines, and internationally. It offers products for food and beverage, home care, personal care, and pet food sectors. The company was formerly known as Daibochi Berhad and changed its name to Scientex Packaging (Ayer Keroh) Berhad in December 2021. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Melaka Pindah, Malaysia. Scientex Packaging (Ayer Keroh) Berhad is a subsidiary of Scientex Berhad.
